description: TECNOLOGÍAS DE CONSTRUCCIÓN APROPIABLES, SANEAMIENTO BASICO AMBIENTAL y ENERGIAS ALTERNAS. Las Experiencias Amazónicas como base para la implementación de la Red de Tecnologías Apropiadas de la Amazonia –RETAM

subproject.description:
General strategy:
Contribute to the knowledge, disclosure and transference of the Amazon promising experiences, regarding appropiate technologies on: construction technologies, basic environmental drainage and alternative energies.
Major goals:
1.Contribute to the knowledges, disclosure and transference of the Amazon promising experience, regarding Appropiate Technologies.
2. Systematize the experiences developed in Ec, Gy, Pe and Su, in the field of the appropiated technologies.
3. To configure an institutional network of researches, technicians, technologies, projects and services related to the main subject.
The beneficiaries of this project are the 8 countries members of the OTCA.
subproject.title: AMAZONIA: AMB & ENERGIA ALTERN

title: AMAZONIA: AMB & ENERGIA ALTERNATIVA
